name: TriggerPipeline
description: Build and Release Management task to trigger a Azure DevOps release or build pipeline.
author: Maik van der Gaag

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure DevOps service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure DevOps Organization service connection that should be used to connect to Azure DevOps

inputs.name: AzureDevOpsProjectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project were in the pipeline resides

inputs.name: PipelineName
inputs.label: Pipeline name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline to trigger

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to build. When kept empty the default branch of the build will be used.

inputs.name: BuildNumber
inputs.label: Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The succeeded build number to release of the primary artifact. When kept empty the latest version is used.
